segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I see the woman at work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully wiping that plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look, the sink is spilling water all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a lake on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem is getting wet, what a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy climbs the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles threateningly, heightening the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate, maybe to steady or collect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, hand extended expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for some sweet secrecy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a recipe for slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel anxious watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR
